faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about Bailo. If you can't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to contact us.
faq.contact.title: Didn't find your answer?
faq.contact.subtitle: Our support team is available to help you with all your questions.
faq.a1: Bailo is a platform dedicated to real estate rental that allows you to rate and be rated with confidence. Whether you're a tenant or landlord, Bailo accompanies you in your rental journey.
faq.a2: Bailo offers a free version with basic features. To access all premium features, monthly and annual subscriptions are available at competitive rates.
faq.q3: How do I create an account?
faq.a3: To create an account, click the 'Sign up' button at the top of the page. Fill in the form with your personal information, validate your email and you can start using Bailo immediately.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal and bank transfers for annual subscriptions. All payments are secured via our partner Stripe.
faq.q5: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a5: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your personal space. The cancellation will take effect at the end of your current billing period, and you will retain access until that date.
faq.q6: How do I get a refund?
faq.a6: If you're not satisfied, you have 14 days after your subscription to request a full refund. Contact our support via the support page with your Bailo ID to initiate the process.
faq.a7: KYC (Know Your Customer) verification confirms your identity. Upload a valid ID and follow the verification steps to get your verified profile badge.
faq.a8: Yes, with a Premium account, you can submit unlimited reviews. The free plan allows up to 3 reviews per month.
faq.q9: How does the rating system work?
faq.a9: After each rental experience, you can leave a rating from 1 to 5 stars along with a comment. These reviews help the community make informed decisions.
faq.q10: Is the application available on mobile?
faq.a10: Bailo is accessible via your web browser on mobile and desktop. A native iOS and Android application is currently in development and will be available soon.
faq.q11: I forgot my password, what should I do?
faq.a11: Click on 'Login' then 'Forgot password'. Enter your email address and you will receive a link to reset your password within minutes.
faq.a12: You can contact our support team via the dedicated page by creating a ticket. We commit to responding within 24 business hours. For emergencies, you can also reach us on our social networks.
